| HistoryText             = The Ho Brothers were at the top of the [[Triads (Earth-616)|Chinatown Mobs]]. Whose heroin operation resulted in a 100,000 overdoes deaths. They were gunned down on the street by [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] with information provided by the [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Kingpin]], thereby eliminating his competition. They were one
of several crimelords that were untouchable, whom the Punisher would never had been able to touch without the files provided by the Kingpin.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 104}} It was part of the Punisher's last campaign, as he had lost it due to unintentionally killing an innocent family and was planning to go out in a blaze of glory.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 41}}
